enumeratedValues.name: REDGE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Pixel data is latched at the falling edge of CSI_PIXCLK

enumeratedValues.name: REDGE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Pixel data is latched at the rising edge of CSI_PIXCLK

enumeratedValues.name: INV_PCLK_0
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_PIXCLK is directly applied to internal circuitry

enumeratedValues.name: INV_PCLK_1
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_PIXCLK is inverted before applied to internal circuitry

INV_DATA.name: INV_DATA
INV_DATA.description: Invert Data Input. This bit enables or disables internal inverters on the data lines.

enumeratedValues.name: INV_DATA_0
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_D[7:0] data lines are directly applied to internal circuitry

enumeratedValues.name: INV_DATA_1
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_D[7:0] data lines are inverted before applied to internal circuitry

enumeratedValues.name: GCLK_MODE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Non-gated clock mode. All incoming pixel clocks are valid. HSYNC is ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: GCLK_MODE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Gated clock mode. Pixel clock signal is valid only when HSYNC is active.

enumeratedValues.name: PACK_DIR_0
enumeratedValues.description: Pack from LSB first. For image data, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33, 0x44, it will appear as 0x44332211 in RX FIFO. For stat data, 0xAAAA, 0xBBBB, it will appear as 0xBBBBAAAA in STAT FIFO.

enumeratedValues.name: PACK_DIR_1
enumeratedValues.description: Pack from MSB first. For image data, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33, 0x44, it will appear as 0x11223344 in RX FIFO. For stat data, 0xAAAA, 0xBBBB, it will appear as 0xAAAABBBB in STAT FIFO.

CCIR_EN.name: CCIR_EN
CCIR_EN.description: BT.656 Interface Enable. This bit selects the type of interface used.

SOF_INTEN.name: SOF_INTEN
SOF_INTEN.description: Start Of Frame (SOF) Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the SOF interrupt.

SOF_POL.name: SOF_POL
SOF_POL.description: SOF Interrupt Polarity. This bit controls the condition that generates an SOF interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: SOF_POL_0
enumeratedValues.description: SOF interrupt is generated on SOF falling edge

enumeratedValues.name: SOF_POL_1
enumeratedValues.description: SOF interrupt is generated on SOF rising edge

RXFF_INTEN.name: RXFF_INTEN
RXFF_INTEN.description: RxFIFO Full Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the RxFIFO full interrupt.

FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN.name: FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN
FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN.description: Frame Buffer1 DMA Transfer Done Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer1 DMA Transfer Done interrupt disable

enumeratedValues.name: FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer1 DMA Transfer Done interrupt enable

FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN.name: FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN
FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN.description: Frame Buffer2 DMA Transfer Done Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer2 DMA Transfer Done interrupt disable

enumeratedValues.name: FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer2 DMA Transfer Done interrupt enable

STATFF_INTEN.name: STATFF_INTEN
STATFF_INTEN.description: STATFIFO Full Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the STAT FIFO interrupt.

SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN.name: SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN
SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN.description: STATFIFO DMA Transfer Done Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: STATFIFO DMA Transfer Done interrupt disable

enumeratedValues.name: SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: STATFIFO DMA Transfer Done interrupt enable

RF_OR_INTEN.name: RF_OR_INTEN
RF_OR_INTEN.description: RxFIFO Overrun Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the RX FIFO overrun interrupt.

SF_OR_INTEN.name: SF_OR_INTEN
SF_OR_INTEN.description: STAT FIFO Overrun Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the STATFIFO overrun interrupt.

COF_INT_EN.name: COF_INT_EN
COF_INT_EN.description: Change Of Image Field (COF) Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: PrP_IF_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: CSI to PrP bus is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: PrP_IF_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: CSI to PrP bus is enabled

EOF_INT_EN.name: EOF_INT_EN
EOF_INT_EN.description: End-of-Frame Interrupt Enable. This bit enables and disables the EOF interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: EOF_INT_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: EOF interrupt is generated when RX count value is reached.

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_0
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_1
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_2
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_3
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_4
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_5
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_6
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_7
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_8
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_9
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

VSC.name: VSC
VSC.description: Vertical Skip Count. Contains the number of rows to skip. SCE must be 1, otherwise VSC is ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_0
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_1
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_2
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_3
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_4
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_5
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_6
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_7
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_8
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_9
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

LVRM.name: LVRM
LVRM.description: Live View Resolution Mode. Selects the grid size used for live view resolution.

BTS.name: BTS
BTS.description: Bayer Tile Start. Controls the Bayer pattern starting point.

AFS.name: AFS
AFS.description: Auto Focus Spread. Selects which green pixels are used for auto-focus.

enumeratedValues.name: AFS_0
enumeratedValues.description: Abs Diff on consecutive green pixels

enumeratedValues.name: AFS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Abs Diff on every third green pixels

enumeratedValues.name: AFS_2
enumeratedValues.description: Abs Diff on every four green pixels

DRM.name: DRM
DRM.description: Double Resolution Mode. Controls size of statistics grid.

DMA_BURST_TYPE_SFF.name: DMA_BURST_TYPE_SFF
DMA_BURST_TYPE_SFF.description: Burst Type of DMA Transfer from STATFIFO. Selects the burst type of DMA transfer from STATFIFO.

DMA_BURST_TYPE_RFF.name: DMA_BURST_TYPE_RFF
DMA_BURST_TYPE_RFF.description: Burst Type of DMA Transfer from RxFIFO. Selects the burst type of DMA transfer from RxFIFO.

enumeratedValues.name: ECC_INT_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: No interrupt is generated when error is detected. Only the status bit ECC_INT is set.

enumeratedValues.name: ECC_INT_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Interrupt is generated when error is detected.

HRESP_ERR_EN.name: HRESP_ERR_EN
HRESP_ERR_EN.description: Hresponse Error Enable. This bit enables the hresponse (AHB protocol standard) error interrupt.

FRMCNT_RST.name: FRMCNT_RST
FRMCNT_RST.description: Frame Count Reset. Resets the Frame Counter. (Cleared automatically after reset is done)

enumeratedValues.name: DRDY_1
enumeratedValues.description: At least 1 datum (word) is ready in RXFIFO.

enumeratedValues.name: ECC_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Error is detected in BT.656 coding

enumeratedValues.name: COF_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Change of video field is detected.

enumeratedValues.name: F1_INT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Field 1 of video is not detected.

enumeratedValues.name: F1_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Field 1 of video is about to start.

enumeratedValues.name: F2_INT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Field 2 of video is not detected

enumeratedValues.name: F2_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Field 2 of video is about to start

SOF_INT.name: SOF_INT
SOF_INT.description: Start of Frame Interrupt Status. Indicates when SOF is detected. (Cleared by writing 1)

EOF_INT.name: EOF_INT
EOF_INT.description: End of Frame (EOF) Interrupt Status. Indicates when EOF is detected. (Cleared by writing 1)

DMA_TSF_DONE_FB1.name: DMA_TSF_DONE_FB1
DMA_TSF_DONE_FB1.description: DMA Transfer Done in Frame Buffer1

DMA_TSF_DONE_FB2.name: DMA_TSF_DONE_FB2
DMA_TSF_DONE_FB2.description: DMA Transfer Done in Frame Buffer2

DMA_FIELD1_DONE.name: DMA_FIELD1_DONE
DMA_FIELD1_DONE.description: When DMA field 1 is complete, this bit will be set to 1(clear by writing 1).

DMA_FIELD0_DONE.name: DMA_FIELD0_DONE
DMA_FIELD0_DONE.description: When DMA field 0 is complete, this bit will be set to 1(clear by writing 1).

BASEADDR_CHHANGE_ERROR.name: BASEADDR_CHHANGE_ERROR
BASEADDR_CHHANGE_ERROR.description: When using base address switching enable, this bit will be 1 when switching occur before DMA complete

DMASA_STATFIFO.name: DMASA_STATFIFO
DMASA_STATFIFO.description: CSI DMA Start Address Register - for STATFIFO

DMATS_STATFIFO.name: DMATS_STATFIFO
DMATS_STATFIFO.description: CSI DMA Transfer Size Register - for STATFIFO

DMASA_FB1.name: DMASA_FB1
DMASA_FB1.description: CSI DMA Start Address Register - for Frame Buffer1

DMA_START_ADDR_FB1.name: DMA_START_ADDR_FB1
DMA_START_ADDR_FB1.description: DMA Start Address in Frame Buffer1

DMASA_FB2.name: DMASA_FB2
DMASA_FB2.description: CSI DMA Transfer Size Register - for Frame Buffer2

DMA_START_ADDR_FB2.name: DMA_START_ADDR_FB2
DMA_START_ADDR_FB2.description: DMA Start Address in Frame Buffer2

DEINTERLACE_STRIDE.name: DEINTERLACE_STRIDE
DEINTERLACE_STRIDE.description: DEINTERLACE_STRIDE is only used in the deinterlace mode

IMAGE_HEIGHT.name: IMAGE_HEIGHT
IMAGE_HEIGHT.description: Image Height. Indicates how many pixels in a column of the image from the sensor.

IMAGE_WIDTH.name: IMAGE_WIDTH
IMAGE_WIDTH.description: This field indicates the number of active pixel cycles per line

DEINTERLACE_EN.name: DEINTERLACE_EN
DEINTERLACE_EN.description: This bit is used to select the output method When input is standard BT.656 video.

PARALLEL24_EN.name: PARALLEL24_EN
PARALLEL24_EN.description: Enable bit for Parallel RGB888/YUV444 24bit input

BASEADDR_SWITCH_EN.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_EN
BASEADDR_SWITCH_EN.description: When this bit is enabled, CSI DMA will switch the base address according to BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL rather than automatically by DMA completed

BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL
BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL.description: CSI 2 base addresses switching method. When using this bit, BASEADDR_SWITCH_EN is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: Switching base address at the edge of the vsync

enumeratedValues.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: Switching base address at the edge of the first data of each frame

FIELD0_DONE_IE.name: FIELD0_DONE_IE
FIELD0_DONE_IE.description: In interlace mode, field 0 means interrupt enabled.

DMA_FIELD1_DONE_IE.name: DMA_FIELD1_DONE_IE
DMA_FIELD1_DONE_IE.description: When in interlace mode, field 1 done interrupt enable.

LAST_DMA_REQ_SEL.name: LAST_DMA_REQ_SEL
LAST_DMA_REQ_SEL.description: Choosing the last DMA request condition

BASEADDR_CHANGE_ERROR_IE.name: BASEADDR_CHANGE_ERROR_IE
BASEADDR_CHANGE_ERROR_IE.description: Base address change error interrupt enable signal.

AHB_HPROT.name: AHB_HPROT
AHB_HPROT.description: Hprot value in AHB bus protocol.

MASK_OPTION.name: MASK_OPTION
MASK_OPTION.description: These bits used to choose the method to mask the CSI input.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_0
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory (OCRAM or external DDR) from first completely frame, when using this option, the CSI_ENABLE should be 1.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_1
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory when CSI_ENABLE is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_2
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory from second completely frame, when using this option, the CSI_ENABLE should be 1.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_3
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory when data comes in, not matter the CSI_ENABLE is 1 or 0.

DMA_RFIFO_HIGHEST_FIFO_LEVEL.name: DMA_RFIFO_HIGHEST_FIFO_LEVEL
DMA_RFIFO_HIGHEST_FIFO_LEVEL.description: This byte stores the highest FIFO level achieved by CSI FIFO timely and will be clear by writing 8'ff to it
